sentences.en: One of Emma's less laudable characteristics was her jealousy.
sentences.cn: 忌妒心强是埃玛的一个不那么值得褒扬的性格特点。

sentences.en: Peter Senge and Goran Carstedt see this development as laudable but suggest that simply adopting ecoefficiency innovations could actually worsen environmental stresses in the future.
sentences.cn: Peter Senge 和 Goran Carstedt 认为这种发展是值得称赞的，但他们认为，简单地采用生态效率创新实际上会加剧未来的环境压力。
这一计划虽然有点夸张，但其志可嘉。
